name: Metro Bus Driving Mission
description:
Metro Bus Driving Mission is the metro bus easy drive on city and highway road. Game is about dealing with loads of passengers just entering and dropping off of the city bus. One of the kind bus service in big stylish and speedy traffic environment. All sorts of driving and parking tasks are tested in the game. Take sharp turns and use the rearview mirror for the parallel parking. Furious drive on the roads full of honking vans and cars. School kids are crossing streets with no care, so slow down at the zebra crossing and become the responsible local bus driver simulator.
- Optimized game performance
- Realistic vehicle pyhsics, high quality graphics and unlimited missions.
- Tilting, button or steering wheel controls.
- Support us so we can add more buses.
